Package org.elasticsearch.index.codec.postingsformat

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PostingsFormatProvider
    A PostingsFormatProvider acts as a named container for specific PostingsFormat implementations.
    PostingsFormatProvider.Factory
    A simple factory used to create PostingsFormatProvider used by delegating providers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPostingsFormatProvider
    Simple abstract PostingsFormat requiring a name for the provider;
    BloomFilterPostingsFormat
    A PostingsFormat useful for low doc-frequency fields such as primary keys.
    BloomFilterPostingsFormat.BloomFilteredTerms  
    BloomFilterPostingsFormatProvider  
    DefaultPostingsFormatProvider
    The default postingsformat, maps to Lucene41PostingsFormat.
    Elasticsearch090PostingsFormat
    This is the default postings format for Elasticsearch that special cases the _uid field to use a bloom filter while all other fields will use a Lucene41PostingsFormat.
    PostingFormats
    This class represents the set of Elasticsearch "built-in" postings format factories bloom_default: a postings format that uses a bloom filter to improve term lookup performance.
    PostingsFormatProvider.Helper
    A helper class to lookup providers by their unique name
    PostingsFormatService
    The PostingsFormatService provides access to all configured PostingsFormatProvider instances by name.
    PreBuiltPostingsFormatProvider  
    PreBuiltPostingsFormatProvider.Factory
